ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Bravura Nerf HIT
ygData.msgSnippet: Are you talking about 50+ mobs? If so, it s fairly simple: to a 50th a yellow con mob is level 51 or 52, anything else beyond that is an educated guess. I used
ygData.messageBody:
Are you talking about 50+ mobs? If so, it's fairly simple: to a 50th a
yellow con mob is level 51 or 52, anything else beyond that is an educated
guess. I used to think there was a hard level cap on affecting red mobs with
spells with my druid, like maybe anything 6 levels above you will 100%
resist all of your spells. I thought people were maybe trying to figure mob
levels out using that logic. That was until I found myself nuking a 49th
level shark at lvl 37.

Sartori D'Elsiraad<Legion>
50th Bard of Veeshan

> Hrm, this brings up an interesting question for myself. If the
>old bard charm wasn't capped, how did my guildmates know what level
>certain mobs were...
>
><thinks there's some showeq stuff going on>
>
> In any case the point is moot, since bards can't charm anything in
>sky anymore, except for maybe npc pets.
>
>--
>Miriana
>Legions of Darkness
>Innoruuk Server
>
